text: After 3 short and entertaining games, it's good to see the developers taking the next step and create such a solid Metroidvania. The great pixelart and music immediately impressed me and the gameplay felt spot on. Sometimes you play a game and it only takes a couple minutes to know that you will like it. Some of the areas (mainly the darker ones) and the way the are structured really reminded me of the real Metroidvanias. It's also very well balanced and provides a good challenge. I'm already excited for a sequel and hopefully they can expand it even more and add a weapons system.
author: SupraDarky

text: It took you til #4 to get to a game you didn't say you were disappointed in. Seems like 2016 was a weak year for games.

author: SupraDarky

text:
Favourite game I played in 2017 so far, I loved it so much I got the first 3... Which have only a few in common, but share the charm of lovely pixel art (and nice soundtrack).
I hope Momodora 4 will open the way for the series, it deserves it. I loved the Pinacotheca theme so much...
